A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This is a \"fun\" movie to watch\, but........ I am so disappointed with Johnson's direction for the movie. Once again\, Disney couldn't come up with a plot that didn't copy the original trilogy.  After pumping up the questions of who were Rey's parents and who Snoke was......total let down. Finn and Rose's mission was a complete waste of time because it didn't contribute to the story AT ALL!  Luke\, the anchor of the franchise\, is a disgruntled\, gone crazy\, hermit. It is obvious Disney wants to kill the old characters and move on. Phantom Menace was better!
